articles.author: Camilo Montoya-Galvez
articles.title: While many U.S. voters welcome Trump's tougher border policies, his win puts migrants on edge - CBS News
articles.description: Trump's promises of mass deportation and tougher border policies appealed to many American voters. But his election has also caused fear and uncertainty among migrants desperate to enter the U.S.
articles.content: Nogales, Mexico — Ivan Castro Santos, his wife and their four children, including 1-year-old triplets, have been living in a crowded room over the past four months, waiting for an opportunity to ente… [+4737 chars]
